com.avaya.ic.sdk

Interface MediaInteraction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChatMediaInteraction, VoiceMediaInteraction

    public interface MediaInteraction
    Represents an interaction between two or more parties occurring in real time over media.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MediaInteraction.Operation 
      static class  MediaInteraction.OperationFailed
      Event indicating the asynchronous operation failed
      static class  MediaInteraction.OperationSucceeded
      Indicates that the asynchronous operation has succeeded.
      static class  MediaInteraction.ParentMediaChanged
      In case of conferencing a multimedia workitem(chat and voice), voice is always followed by chat.
      static class  MediaInteraction.PartyAdded
      Indicates that a party was added to the interaction.
      static class  MediaInteraction.PartyDropped
      Indicates that a party was removed from the interaction.
      static class  MediaInteraction.State
      Defines the State of a MediaInteraction.
      static class  MediaInteraction.StateChanged
      Event to indicate whether state has changed
      static class  MediaInteraction.Type
      Defines the media type of a Mediainteraction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void complete()
      In case of multimedia interaction, if a child interaction needs to be completed this API needs to be invoked.
      java.lang.String getId()
      Get the ID uniquely identifying this Media Interaction
      java.lang.String getOrigin()
      Get the origin of the MediaInteraction.
      java.lang.String getParentMediaInteractionEduId()
      Get The edu id of the parent media.
      WorkItem getParentWorkItem()
      Get the workitem that contains this media interaction
      ParticipantList getParticipants()
      Get A list of the participants comprising the interaction.
      MediaInteraction.State getState()
      Get the current state of the media interaction
      java.lang.String getTopic()
      Get the Topic of the conversation/interaction
      MediaInteraction.Type getType()
      Get the type of media this interaction represents
      boolean isParentMedia()
      Get true if this interaction is parent or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Get the ID uniquely identifying this Media Interaction
        Returns:
        the ID uniquely identifying this Media Interaction

      • getType

        MediaInteraction.Type getType()
        Get the type of media this interaction represents
        Returns:
        the type of media this interaction represents

      • getParentWorkItem

        WorkItem getParentWorkItem()
        Get the workitem that contains this media interaction
        Returns:
        the workitem that contains this media interaction

      • getState

        MediaInteraction.State getState()
        Get the current state of the media interaction
        Returns:
        the current state of the media interaction

      • getTopic

        java.lang.String getTopic()
        Get the Topic of the conversation/interaction
        Returns:
        the Topic of the conversation/interaction

      • getOrigin

        java.lang.String getOrigin()
        Get the origin of the MediaInteraction. In case of voice, it returns the number from where the call originated i.e. the ANI of call. In case of chat, it returns the Customer display name.
        Returns:
        the origin of the MediaInteraction. In case of voice, it returns the number from where the call originated i.e. the ANI of call. In case of chat, it returns the Customer display name.

      • getParticipants

        ParticipantList getParticipants()
        Get A list of the participants comprising the interaction.
        Returns:
        A list of the participants comprising the interaction.

      • isParentMedia

        boolean isParentMedia()
        Get true if this interaction is parent or not. In case of multimedia interactions, this will help to identify the parent interaction and child interaction. Returns false, in case this is a child interaction
        Returns:
        true if this interaction is parent or not. In case of multimedia interactions, this will help to identify the parent interaction and child interaction. Returns false, in case this is a child interaction

      • getParentMediaInteractionEduId

        java.lang.String getParentMediaInteractionEduId()
        Get The edu id of the parent media. In case of multimedia interaction, this will return the edu id of its parent interaction. If this interaction is not a child interaction, then this will return the edu id of self
        Returns:
        The edu id of the parent media. In case of multimedia interaction, this will return the edu id of its parent interaction. If this interaction is not a child interaction, then this will return the edu id of self

      • complete

        void complete()
        In case of multimedia interaction, if a child interaction needs to be completed this API needs to be invoked.

        Note: Invoking this API on parent interaction, will behave the same as if Workitem.complete is invoked.
